availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Jefferson Vice (Bath County, Kentucky, resident and student)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, resident. Bath County native. Son of Joseph Vice and Carolina Nailor Vice. Married to Elizabeth Anderson Vice. Father of John William Vice. Resident in Bath County in 1850. Student in Bath County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, District 1, p. 5A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 142.
